relationships.entity_2: hawgwarts school of witchcraft and wizardry
relationships.description: Harry is expelled from Hogwarts, as stated in the letter.
The Ministry of Magic issued a warning to Harry for his previous offense under section 13 of the International Confederation of Wizards' Statute of Secrecy.
The Ministry of Magic requires Harry to attend a disciplinary hearing at 9 a.m. on August 12th.
